title: Dajiao Niu Meng Gongchang
synopsis: After the original guardian of Niu Dadu retired, he entrusted Grandpa Niu to hand over a magic weapon, the foolish gourd, to a brave who could become the new guardian of Niu Dadu. As a result, Big Horn Niu was selected. Confused Gourd has the ability to reward good Gourd Beans to people who are upright and worthy of praise, and use bad Gourd Beans to punish those who make mistakes and bad intentions. The badass bat demon on Moonback Mountain was jealous of the big horn bull's good reputation, and tried his best to make the big horn bull ugly, and exhausted his bad ideas to tease and frame the big horn bull. But with the help of the confused gourd and his friends, Bighorn Bull smashed the bat demon's conspiracy time and time again, making the bat devil suffer for the bad things he did.(translated from baidu baike)
